VenueList.summary: Multiple venue objects with selected fields.

like.description: Unique identifier string of the venue for which you want a list of similar venues.

location.description: The location of events you want a listing for. Values should be prefixed with the type of location data you are submitting. ("name:", "postcode:", "geo:"]

radius_distance.description: The furthest distance from the location you want events listed for.

distance_unit.description: The unit of measurment that should be applied to the radius_distance value.

postcode.description: The postcode of the venue(s) you want a listing for.

incl_image.description: Decides whether or not an venue image is included in the response.

image_size.description: Chooses the size of image included with each venue object if one is available.

full_description.description: Decides whether full or summarised description text is included in the response.

incl_also_liked.description: Decides whether or not a list of IDs for similar venues is included in the response.

updated_since.description: Only retrive venues that have been added/updated since the given date.

results_per_page.description: The number of results you want per page/chunk.

page.description: The page/chunk of results to be requested.

order_by.description: Order events by the named object property.

VenueRead.summary: A venue object with all fields.

id.description: Unique identifier string of the Venue you want full details for.

incl_events.description: Decides whether or not a list of events at this venue at is included in the response.

incl_images.description: Decides whether or not an venue images are included in the response.

incl_also_liked.description: Decides whether or not a list of IDs for similar venues is included in the response.

full_description.description: Decides whether full or summarised description text is included in the response.

VenueEvents.summary: A list of events for a venue.

id.description: Unique identifier string of the Venue you want full details for.

incl_image.description: Decides whether or not an event image is included in the response.

image_size.description: Chooses the size of image included with each venue object if one is available.

incl_stages.description: Decides whether or not a list of stages is included for any festival events in the response.

incl_artists.description: Decides whether or not a list of performing artists is included in the response.

incl_occurences.description: Decides whether or not a list of individual event occurrences is included for any repeat events in the response.

incl_tickets.description: Decides whether or not a list of available tickets is included in the response.

full_description.description: Decides whether full or summarised description text is included in the response.

updated_since.description: Only retrive venues that have been added/updated since the given date.

results_per_page.description: The number of results you want per page/chunk.

page.description: The page/chunk of results to be requested.

order_by.description: Order events by the named object property.

VenueImage.summary: A venue image retrieved as either a JSON object or JPEG image.

id.description: Unique identifier string of the venue you want an image for.

format.description: The format of the response you want back from the resource
